attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am regularly assailed by Chuggers when walking along the street. There can often be 6 or 7 of them harrassing people in a single location. I support several charities and would not wish to deprive the charities of money to do good work. But I find these people obtrusive and threatening. Also in these days identity theft it is incongruous that we allow people to stop you on the street and ask for personal details.
